title: ID these font please! I think it's a new one.
content:
Hi everybody could anyone Id these 2 kind of fonts used in these ad for me please.

thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [perdigao2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090523054110/http:/typophile.com/files/perdigao2.jpg) | 14.1 KB |
author: Pedro Henrique Gomes

comments.content: Not especially new, no, unless you consider 250 years “new.” It’s definitely a Baskerville, and I think [Baskerville No. 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20090523054110/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/baskerville-no2-t/) is probably the closest match.
